data.name: EMail.Help
data.value: Enter your valid email address, and if you do not want your email address displayed, clear the check mark before submitting

data.name: SaveError.Text
data.value:
An Error Has Occurred When Attempting To Upload your article. Please Contact Your Hosting Provider To Ensure The Appropriate Security Settings Have Been Enabled On The Server.
Actual Error:

data.name: Summary.Help
data.value: Enter a brief summary of the article that you are submitting

data.name: Categories.Help
data.value: Check one or more categories that you would like this article to be associated with

data.name: DeleteConfirmation.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

data.name: FileSentModerationRequired.Text
data.value:
Your article MUST be approved by an Administrator
BEFORE it is published on the web site. You will receive
an email when your article has been approved.

Do you wish to Submit your Article now?

data.name: Header.Help
data.value: Use this page to submit an article to the web site

data.name: Title.Help
data.value: Enter a Title for the article you are submitting

data.name: RestrictedFileSuffix.Text
data.value: Please Contact Your Hosting Provider If You Need To Upload A File Type Which Is Not Supported

data.name: ModerationRequired.Text
data.value: MODERATION NOTICE: This is a moderated library. Your article will NOT appear until the site Administrator reviews and approves your article.

data.name: FileName.Help
data.value: If you would like to provide a downloadable version of the article (.PDF, .DOC) upload the file here

data.name: NoModerationRequired.Text
data.value: MODERATION NOTICE: Since you are an Moderator for this library, your article will NOT require moderation and will be automatically approved.

data.name: FileTooLarge.Text
data.value: The File Exceeds The Amount Of Disk Space You Currently Have Available. Please Contact Your Hosting Provider For Inquiries Related To Increasing Your Portal Disk Space

data.name: Description.Help
data.value: Enter a detailed description of the atricle that you are uploading

data.name: URL.Help
data.value: Enter the URL for the Resource your are uploading

data.name: AuthorImage.Help
data.value: Upload a small picture of yourself. The image will be resized to 75 pixels wide.

data.name: Image.Help
data.value: Browse to the image that you would like to upload

data.name: RestrictedFilePrefix.Text
data.value: The File Is A Restricted File Type. Valid File Types Include

data.name: Guidelines.Text
data.value: SUBMISSION GUIDELINES: In submitting this article I agree that it may be read/downloaded by other visitors to this web site. I also state that I have the authority to submit this article and that I am not breaking any copyright law by it's submission. I agree to hold the administrators and owners of this web site harmless for any damages caused by my submitting this article to this server.

data.name: DownloadVersion.Text
data.value: In addition to presenting your article online, you can provide a downloadable version of your article (.PDF, .DOC) for your readers to download. This is optional and may be left blank.

data.name: InvalidURL.Text
data.value: You did not enter a valid URL, URLs must start with either http, https, ftp or gopher
